com.deniz.balanced.business

Interface UserBusinessService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    FrameworkBusinessService<UserDto>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserBusinessServiceImpl

    @Transactional
public interface UserBusinessService
extends FrameworkBusinessService<UserDto>
    Interface for business layer to be seen from service layer
    Gets entities from backend service and convert them to be used in service layer
    Author:
    deniz.yavas
